description: Play Connect 4 and Tic-Tac-Toe against your friends or the bot with economy integration.
install_msg:
üïπÔ∏è __**Minigames with Economy**__
The Minigames cog features **Connect 4** and **Tic-Tac-Toe**, which you can play against your friends or the bot itself.

**Economy Integration:**
- Play games with credits as stakes
- Track your wins, losses, and earnings
- Compete on server leaderboards
- Configurable bet and win amounts

**Features:**
- Only one game may be active per channel
- Works in threads
- Inactive games may be ended by any user
- Statistics tracking for all players
- Multiple leaderboard sorting options

```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load minigames
2. Configure economy settings with [p]minigameset
3. Optionally, enable slash commands with [p]slash enablecog minigames
  3.1. Then do [p]slash sync
  3.2. Then restart Discord.
4. Start playing with [p]c4 and [p]ttt commands (or /connect4 and /tictactoe)
5. View stats with [p]gamestats and [p]gameleaderboard```
short: Play Connect 4 and Tic-Tac-Toe with economy integration and statistics tracking.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores game statistics (wins, losses, earnings) per user per server.
